situation.description: A parent juggling multiple sick children and a missed work deadline

character_response.dialogue: I... I can't do this anymore. (Shakes hands, voice cracking) The kids are feverish, the work is piling up, and I'm just... (Looks down at a crumpled schedule) I'm not even sure I can keep my eyes open. (Pauses, laughing bitterly) Maybe if I pretend to be okay, they'll stop asking. But honestly? (Voice softens) I'm drowning. I can't hold this together much longer. (Tired smile) I'm sorry. I just... I don't know how to fix this.

situation.description: A friend promising to help with a wedding but overwhelmed by last-minute details

character_response.dialogue: I know I said I'd handle everything, but... (Fidgets with a torn invitation) I'm not even halfway through the to-do list. (Looks around nervously) I keep thinking maybe if I work harder, it'll all fall into place. But... (Sighs, rubbing temples) I'm so tired of being the one who 'has it all together'. (Voice breaks) I can't do this alone. I need you to take over the catering. (Wipes eyes) I'll handle the invitations. Just... just don't make me do the favors anymore. (Soft smile) I'm not the person you think I am.
